title: Alister Jack – 2022 New Year Message
author: admin
summary: The new year message from Alister Jack, the Secretary of State for Scotland, issued on 30 December 2022.
content:
This past year is one we will never forget – the year the UK came together to mourn the passing of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.
